B9: Compare Accumulator with Register C Data

BC: Compare Accumulator with Register H Data
BD: Compare Accumulator with Register L Data

C1: Pop 2-byte Stack Data into Register Pair BC
C2: Jump to Provided Address if Not Zero
C4: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Not Zero
C5: Push Register Pair BC Data to the Top of Stack
CA: Jump to Provided Address if Zero
CC: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Zero
CE: Add Carry and Immediate Data to Accumulator
D1: Pop 2-byte Stack Data into Register Pair DE
D2: Jump to Provided Address if Not Carry
D3: Output Accumulator Data to Provided Port Address
D4: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Not Carry
D5: Push Register Pair DE Data to the Top of Stack
DA: Jump to Provided Address if Carry
DC: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Carry
DE: Subtract Borrow and Immediate Data from Accumulator
E1: Pop 2-byte Stack Data into Register Pair HL
E2: Jump to Provided Address if Parity is Odd
E3: Exchange Top of Stack with HL Register Pair
E4: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Parity is Odd
E5: Push Register Pair HL Data to the Top of Stack
E9: Load Program Counter with HL Register Pair Data
EA: Jump to Provided Address if Parity is Even
EB: Exchange Data of HL and DE Register Pair
EC: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Parity is Even
F1: Pop 2-byte Stack Data into Register Pair PSW/AL
F2: Jump to Provided Address if Sign is Plus
F4: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Sign is Plus
F5: Push Register Pair PSW/AL Data to the Top of Stack
F9: Load Stack Pointer with HL Register Pair Data
FA: Jump to Provided Address if Sign is Minus
FC: Call/Branch to Provided Subroutine Address if Sign is Minus
